name: taking control
description:
A short experimental game reliving the day after I turned 15, when I decided to tattoo a beetle on my arm to try to take control of my own body. Being a disabled AFAB kid isn't easy in this modern America. 

This was 34 days before Roe v. Wade was overturned. 

Sign Planned Parenthood's petition here. Please donate if you can.

I will probably never update or improve this game unless anybody actually cares enough to ask. Either way, thank you for playing.

This game was just an experiment to test the ropes of Ren'Py, but that doesn't mean the story I'm telling isn't important. Abortion is a human right, and no one gets to control our bodies. 

Right now, this is all I can do to remind myself of that.
